Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment: "I was initially excited to be accepted by Huffington Post. Then I learned that they are opening up a contributor platform and accepting anyone who wants to write something. The blog posts will no longer be searchable, and content is pretty much buried in the site. So much for payment with exposure. I won't write for them again."
